duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic guidance on people and organizational issues including organization change, talent management, succession planning, leader coaching and development, performance management, employee relations, and HR function initiatives.

Help the organization grow by diagnosing gaps between current and desired organization performance, advising on the organization change management required to evolve the finance, IT and legal functions.
Work with the talent and business partner teams to evolve and embed talent strategies to enable diversity, inclusion, and engagement.
Participate in company-wide programs and initiatives (e.g., Workforce Planning, Total Rewards, Organizational Change, Performance Management, Talent Development, and Succession Planning).
Site HR support for our global headquarters.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business, or related discipline or equivalent experience (Master’s degree preferred)
